name: The Adventures of the Smurfs
storyline: The Smurfs have turned orange! You must help Handy Smurf build a machine to save his friends. Your adventures will take you through 16 exciting levels where you will cross a river, travel deep within the mines, fly high up in an airplane, avoid lava from a volcano and so much more!
summary: Adventures Of The Smurfs is a game released for the Gameboy Color. It was released solely in Europe due to the continued popularity of the Smurf characters in that area.
